name: Size Matters
description: My chain analyst’s POV has helped me clearly articulate where data can be leaked, how privacy tech can go wrong, and what to prioritize while we build Namada as a product that brings the best practical privacy to users today. I hope this helps you too, if you’re also building privacy-preserving protocols and dApps

speakers.name: awa
speakers.bio: Awa joined Chainalysis as the first female data scientist and software engineer in 2017, after working on papers on using on-chain data to de-anonymise Bitcoin. Awa joined Tendermint/Cosmos as a researcher, where she met Adrian and Christopher, and helped out with the Ethereum Community Fund initiative in 2018-2019. Ever since, Awa has co-founded and built several ventures with Adrian and Christopher.
